AppDB.Name: EGQ_MULTICAST_FIFOS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This register configures unicast and multicast FIFOs.

Field.Name: TDM_FIFO_FULL
Field.Description: When this threshold crossed, TDM packet will be sent to Unicast FIFO with discard indication. We should not reach this threshold as TdmFifoAlmostFull threshold will stop the traffic in RQP before.

Field.Name: UNICAST_FIFO_FULL
Field.Description: When set, RQP will stop reading from FDA Non-TDM path.

Field.Name: MC_HIGH_FIFO_FULL
Field.Description: When this threshold crossed, Incoming MCH packet is sent to UC-FIFO and marked as discard packet.

Field.Name: MC_LOW_FIFO_FULL
Field.Description: When this threshold crossed, Incoming MCL packet is sent to UC-FIFO and marked as discard packet.

Field.Name: TDM_FIFO_ALMOST_FULL
Field.Description: When this threshold crossed RQP will stop reading from both TDM and Non-TDM FIFOs.

Field.Name: UNICAST_FIFO_DISCARD_TH
Field.Description: When this threshold crossed, New incoming UC packet is rejected in PRP.

Field.Name: MC_HIGH_FIFO_DISCARD_TH
Field.Description: When this threshold crossed, New incoming MCH packet is rejected in PRP, and no transaction will be sent to MC FIFOs. However, packets which already started reassembly in PRP before this event set will continue and will be sent to MC FIFOs

Field.Name: MC_LOW_FIFO_DISCARD_TH
Field.Description: When this threshold crossed, New incoming MCH packet is rejected in PRP, and no transaction will be sent to MC FIFOs. However, packets which already started reassembly in PRP before this event set will continue and will be sent to MC FIFOs

Field.Name: TDM_FIFO_DEPTH
Field.Description: TDM FIFO depth

Field.Name: UNICAST_FIFO_DEPTH
Field.Description: Unicast FIFO depth

Field.Name: MC_HIGH_FIFO_DEPTH
Field.Description: MC-HP FIFO depth

Field.Name: MC_LOW_FIFO_DEPTH
Field.Description: MC-LP FIFO depth

AppDB.Name: EGQ_SHAPER_GLOBAL_CONFIGURATION
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This logical table configures general EGQ shaper HW.

Field.Name: EMPTY_QP_MAX_CREDIT
Field.Description: The maximum credit balance in bytes per Q-PAIR shaper when the corresponding Q-PAIR is empty.

Field.Name: FC_QP_MAX_CREDIT
Field.Description: The maximum credit balance in bytes per Q-PAIR shaper when the corresponding Q-PAIR in FC

Field.Name: FQP_CALENDAR_SWITCH_EN
Field.Description: If set then enables switch between calender A and calender B in FQP sub-block.

Field.Name: FQP_CALENDAR_SET_SEL
Field.Description: If un-set then FQP access FqpNifPortMux entries 0-255 (Calendar A), otherwise entries 256-511 are used (Calendar B).

Field.Name: PQP_CALENDAR_SWITCH_EN
Field.Description: If set then enables switch between calendar A and calender B in PQP sub-block.

Field.Name: PQP_CALENDAR_SET_SEL
Field.Description: If un-set then PQP access PqpNifPortMux entries 0-255 (Calender A), otherwise entries 256-511 are used (Calender B).

Field.Name: EMPTY_PORT_MAX_CREDIT
Field.Description: The maximum credit balance in bytes per OTM-Port shaper when the corresponding OTM-port is empty.

Field.Name: FC_QP_STOP_COLLECTING_EN
Field.Description: If set, then Q-PAIR shapers stop collecting credits when credit balance reaches confgiured value and corresponding Q-Pair in flow-control.

Field.Name: EMPTY_QP_STOP_COLLECTING_EN
Field.Description: If set, then Q-PAIR shapers stop collecting credits when credit balance reaches confgiured value and corresponding Q-Pair is empty.

Field.Name: EMPTY_PORT_STOP_COLLECTING_EN
Field.Description: If set, then OTM-Port shapers stop collecting credits when credit balance reaches confgiured value and corresponding OTM-Port is empty.

Field.Name: NUM_OF_QP_SPR_A
Field.Description: Number of Q pairs. Used for RR along Qpair credit table A. The actual number used by the design is +1 to register value.

Field.Name: NUM_OF_QP_SPR_B
Field.Description: Number of Q pairs. Used for RR along Qpair credit table B. The actual number used by the design is +1 to register value.

Field.Name: NUM_OF_TCG_SPR_A
Field.Description: Number of TCGs. Used for RR along TCG credit table A. The actual number used by the design is +1 to register value.

Field.Name: NUM_OF_TCG_SPR_B
Field.Description: Number of TCGs. Used for RR along TCG credit table B. The actual number used by the design is +1 to register value.

Field.Name: INTERFACE_SPR_ENA
Field.Description: If set, then the shapers for the channelized interfaces are enabled.

Field.Name: QPAIR_SPR_ENA
Field.Description: If set, then the shapers for the egress Q pairs are enabled.

Field.Name: TCG_SPR_ENA
Field.Description: If set, then the shapers for the egress TC groups are enabled.

Field.Name: OTM_SPR_ENA
Field.Description: If set, then the shapers for the egress OTM ports are enabled.

Field.Name: QP_CRDT_TABLE_READ_EN
Field.Description: If asserted Design start allocating credits to QP shapers.

Field.Name: OTM_CRDT_TABLE_READ_EN
Field.Description: If asserted Design start allocating credits to OTM shapers.

Field.Name: TCG_CRDT_TABLE_READ_EN
Field.Description: If asserted Design start allocating credits to TCG shapers.

Field.Name: OTM_SPR_SET_SEL
Field.Description: If set, then the OTM shapers set B is selected. Otherwise, shapers set A is selected.

Field.Name: QPAIR_SPR_SET_SEL
Field.Description: If set, then the Qpairs shapers set B is selected. Otherwise, shapers set A is selected.

Field.Name: TCG_SPR_SET_SEL
Field.Description: If set, then the TCG shapers set B is selected. Otherwise, shapers set A is selected.

Field.Name: CAL_CAL_LENGTH_FOR_OTM_SPR_A
Field.Description: Calendar Length of calendar A. The actual number used by the design is +1 to register value.

Field.Name: CAL_CAL_LENGTH_FOR_OTM_SPR_B
Field.Description: Calendar Length of calendar B. The actual number used by the design is +1 to register value.

Field.Name: IFC_SPR_DIS
Field.Description: bit per calendar shaper. If asserted corresponding shaper is disabled.

Field.Name: IFC_SPR_PKT_MODE
Field.Description: bit per calendar shaper. if set corresponding calendar shaper is in packet resolution. Make sure all OTM under the corresponding calendar are in the same mode !!!.

AppDB.Name: EGQ_GLOBAL_CONFIGURATION
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This logical table configures general EGQ HW.

Field.Name: INVALID_OTM_ENA
Field.Description: If set, and received packet from ERPP with OTM value equals to InvalidOtmNum register then the packet will be sent to delete FIFO.

Field.Name: EGQ_NIF_CREDIT_SIZE
Field.Description: Number of credits to initialize egress interface when the corresponded bit in CreditInit is asserted.

Field.Name: TXQ_IREADY_TH
Field.Description: Define TXQ treshold in PDs, when Q is above this treshold FQP block relevant interface in EPS. Relevant if interface has TDM traffic (TxqTdmIrdySel == 0)

Field.Name: TXQ_TDM_IREADY_TH
Field.Description: Define TXQ treshold in PDs, when Q is above this treshold FQP block relevant interface in EPS. Relevant if interface has TDM traffic (TxqTdmIrdySel == 1)

Field.Name: EGRESS_TDM_MODE
Field.Description: If set, TDM traffic is enabled in EGQ. Otherwise, no TDM traffic is enabled.

Field.Name: TDM_PKT_TC
Field.Description: TDM packet CGM-MC-TC.

Field.Name: TDM_PKT_DP
Field.Description: TDM packet CGM-MC-DP.

AppDB.Name: EGQ_SHAPER_CONFIGURATION
AppDB.OneLineDescription: These registers configure the traffic shaper and recycling.

Field.Name: HP_MIRR_RATE
Field.Description: Number of bandwidth credits, in units of 1/256th byte, to allocate every core clock cycle. 8 lsb are fraction and 8 msb are integer. The amount of credits per cycle is RcyRate15:8 + RcyRate7:0/256. If core-clock runs at 1.2Ghz, this corresponds to the number of 1/256th bytes to allocate every 833.33psec. For a bandwidth of 10Gbps, we need 1.04167 credits per cycle. meaning this register needs to be configured to 267 or 0x10B.

Field.Name: HP_MIRR_MAX_BURST
Field.Description: This field configures the shaper maximal burst.

Field.Name: RCY_RATE
Field.Description: Number of bandwidth credits, in units of 1/256th byte, to allocate every core clock cycle. 8 lsb are fraction and 8 msb are integer. The amount of credits per cycle is RcyRate15:8 + RcyRate7:0/256. If core-clock runs at 1.2Ghz, this corresponds to the number of 1/256th bytes to allocate every 833.33psec. For a bandwidth of 10Gbps, we need 1.04167 credits per cycle. meaning this register needs to be configured to 267 or 0x10B.

Field.Name: RCY_MAX_BURST
Field.Description: This field configures the shaper maximal burst.

Field.Name: RCY_WEIGHT
Field.Description: Recycled traffic WFQ weight

Field.Name: HP_MIRR_WEIGHT
Field.Description: high priority mirror WFQ weight

Field.Name: FORCE_FC_MODE
Field.Description: If set, then ForceOrIgnoreFc register works in force FC mode, else in Ignore FC mode.

Field.Name: CIR_SP_EN
Field.Description: If asserted choose CIR according to SP to lower TCG, otherwise do RR between all TCGs.

AppDB.Name: EGQ_TCG_ATTRIBUTES
AppDB.OneLineDescription: A table containing all 'TC group' shaping attributes which have 'tcg_index' as key (same size as qpair)

Field.Name: WFQ_TCG_DIS
Field.Description: Total number of Q-Pairs in EGQ is 1024. Every 8 Q-Pairs are connected to Port-Scheduler Eelement. In each Scheduler-Element, 8 Q-Pairs may form up to 8 traffic classes groups (TCGs). Each TCG is assigned a CIR and EIR. This register determines whether each TCG is connected to EIR or not.

Field.Name: TCG_SPR_PKT_MODE
Field.Description: If set corresponding TCG shaper is in packet resolution.

Field.Name: TCG_SPR_DIS
Field.Description: If set then the corresponding TCG shaper is disabled (gets auto credit and no need to insert it to the calendar).

AppDB.Name: EGQ_SHAPER_OTM_SHAPER_LENGTH
AppDB.OneLineDescription: A table containing configuration parameters per calendar

Field.Name: PORT_OFFSET_HIGH_A
Field.Description: This parameter specifies the higher bound of the OTM range under the corresponding calendar. Should be configured according to number of ports under the corresponding calendar and port offset of previous calendar. For example : Calendar 0 - RR from 0 to PortOffsetHighA0 Calendar 1 - RR from PortOffsetHighA0 +1 to PortOffsetHighA1 Calendar 2 - RR from PortOffsetHighA1 +1 to PortOffsetHighA2

Field.Name: PORT_OFFSET_HIGH_B
Field.Description: This parameter specifies the higher bound of the OTM range under the corresponding calendar. Should be configured according to number of ports under the corresponding calendar and port offset of previous calendar. For example : Calendar 0 - RR from 0 to PortOffsetHighB0 Calendar 1 - RR from PortOffsetHighB0 +1 to PortOffsetHighB1 Calendar 2 - RR from PortOffsetHighB1 +1 to PortOffsetHighB2

AppDB.Name: EGQ_SHAPER_OTM_CALENDAR_CRDT_TABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: A table containing configuration parameters per OTM calendar and calendar set

Field.Name: CALENDAR_ID
Field.Description: Index of calendar pair. Note that 'nof_calendars' stands for the number of calendar pairs.

Field.Name: CALENDAR_SET
Field.Description: Identifier of calendar within calendar pair ('0' or '1').

Field.Name: OTM_CAL_CRDT_TO_ADD
Field.Description: How many credits to add to port.

Field.Name: OTM_CAL_MAX_BURST
Field.Description: Max credit to accumulate in units of bytes.

AppDB.Name: EGQ_NIF_CAL
AppDB.OneLineDescription: A table containing 'interface' per 'slot' in a calendar

Field.Name: SLOT_ID
Field.Description: Slot within this calendar

Field.Name: SET_SELECT
Field.Description: Indicates which half of the table to use. '0' stands for 'lower half'. Only one half is in use at one time.

Field.Name: PQP_NIF_PORT_MUX
Field.Description: the decoding is as following: CMIC 0, SAT 1, OAM 2, OLP 3, RCY 4, Eventor 5, 6-63 NIF

Field.Name: FQP_NIF_PORT_MUX
Field.Description: NIF port number.

AppDB.Name: EGQ_SHAPER_CAL_CAL_CALENDAR
AppDB.OneLineDescription: A table containing 'calendar index' per 'slot' in a calendar

Field.Name: CAL_SLOT_ID
Field.Description: Slot within this calendar

Field.Name: SET_SELECT
Field.Description: Indicates which half of the table to use. '0' stands for 'lower half'. Only one half is in use at one time.

Field.Name: CAL_INDX
Field.Description: Calendar Indx

AppDB.Name: EGQ_OTM_SHAPING_ATTRIBUTES
AppDB.OneLineDescription: A table containing all 'egress OTM port' shaping attributes which have 'qpair' as key

Field.Name: PORT_ALMOST_EMPTY_DELAY
Field.Description: If asserted Reduce minimum gap serving same OTM when it is almost empty

Field.Name: SP_OVER_WFQ_2P_PORT
Field.Description: If asserted, SP is done before WFQ. Relevant for 2P port only.

Field.Name: OTM_SPR_DIS
Field.Description: If set then the corresponding OTM shaper is disabled (gets auto credit and no need to insert it to the calendar).

Field.Name: OTM_SPR_PKT_MODE
Field.Description: If set corresponding OTM shaper is in packet resolution.

Field.Name: OTM_CAL_SPR_INDX
Field.Description: Must be configurred according to OtmHpCrdtTable/OtmLpCrdtTable OtmIndex field !!!

AppDB.Name: EGQ_SHAPING_TCG_WEIGHTS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: A table of 64 entries, one entry per Port Scheduler. Defines the weights of the 8 traffic class groups (TCG).

Field.Name: WEIGHT_OF_TCG
Field.Description: Array whose index is a single TCG. Each element indicates the weight assigned to this TCG.

AppDB.Name: EGQ_SHAPING_QPAIR_TCG_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: A table of 64 entries containing Mapping each priority (Q-pair) to TCG. One entry per Port Scheduler (a queue group of 8 Q-Pairs).

Field.Name: PRIO_MAP_ELEMENT
Field.Description: Array whose index is a single priority. Each element indicates to which SP scheduler (TCG) it is mapped.

AppDB.Name: EGQ_SHAPING_PS_MODE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: A table of 64 entries containing priority mode per QPAIR group (PS). One entry (two bits) per Port Scheduler (a queue group of 8 Q-Pairs).

Field.Name: PS_MODE
Field.Description: The ETM maintains 1024 queues. These queues are organized into 64 groups of 16 queues each. Every two queues form a queue-pair. Each queue-pair contains one UC and one MC queue. Each queue group is configured as either: One Eight-Priority ETM-Port (8P-Port 2'h3) up to 128 such ports Two Four-Priority ETM-Port (4P-Port 2'h2) up to 256 such ports Four Two-Priority ETM-Ports (2P-Port 2'h1) up to 256 such ports Eight One-Priority ETM-Ports (1P-Port 2'h0) up to 256 such ports.

AppDB.Name: EGQ_SHAPING_TCG_CREDIT_TABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: A table containing all 'TCG_CREDIT_TABLE' fields which have 'double calendar' as key

Field.Name: TCG_CRDT_TO_ADD
Field.Description: How many credits to add to TCG.

Field.Name: TCG_MAX_BURST
Field.Description: Max credit to accumulate in units of bytes.

Field.Name: TCG_INDX
Field.Description: TCG to add credits to.

AppDB.Name: EGQ_SHAPING_QP_CREDIT_TABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: A table containing all 'QP_CREDIT_TABLE' fields which have 'double calendar' as key

Field.Name: QPAIR_CRDT_TO_ADD
Field.Description: How many credits to add to Q-Pair.

Field.Name: QPAIR_MAX_BURST
Field.Description: Max credit to accumulate in units of bytes.

Field.Name: QPAIR_INDEX
Field.Description: Q-Pair to add credits to.

AppDB.Name: EGQ_SHAPING_OTM_HP_CRDT_TABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: A table containing all 'OTM_HP_CRDT_TABLE' fields which have 'double calendar' as key

Field.Name: OTM_CRDT_TO_ADD
Field.Description: How many credits to add to port.

Field.Name: OTM_MAX_BURST
Field.Description: Max credit to accumulate in units of bytes.

Field.Name: OTM_INDEX
Field.Description: OTM index to add credits to.

AppDB.Name: EGQ_SHAPING_OTM_LP_CRDT_TABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: A table containing all 'OTM_LP_CRDT_TABLE' fields which have 'double calendar' as key

Field.Name: OTM_LP_CRDT_TO_ADD
Field.Description: How many credits to add to port.

Field.Name: OTM_MAX_BURST
Field.Description: Max credit to accumulate in units of bytes.

Field.Name: OTM_LP_INDEX
Field.Description: OTM index to add credits to.

AppDB.Name: EGQ_QPAIR_ATTRIBUTES
AppDB.OneLineDescription: A table containing all 'egress queue' attributes which have 'qpair' as key

Field.Name: UC_OR_UC_LOW_QUEUE_WEIGHT
Field.Description: UC queue weight in the WFQ scheduler. The lower the weight, the higher the bandwidth.

Field.Name: MC_OR_MC_LOW_QUEUE_WEIGHT
Field.Description: MC queue weight in the WFQ scheduler. The lower the weight the higher the bandwidth.

Field.Name: RCY_TXQ_NUM
Field.Description: For RCY interface there are two reserved interface IDs. This field maps each OTM port to one of the RCY TXQs. If set the the packet is sent to second RCY TXQ, else to first RCY TXQ.

Field.Name: CR_ADJUST_VALUE
Field.Description: Credit Adjust value for both EPS elements and shapers.

Field.Name: Q_ALMOST_EMPTY_DELAY
Field.Description: If asserted Reduce minimum gap serving same Q when it is almost empty Msb MC, LSB UC.

Field.Name: QP_IS_HP
Field.Description: If asserted corresponding QP is considering as HP during IFC and OTM scheduling.

Field.Name: QP_IS_TDM
Field.Description: Q is TDM.

Field.Name: QPAIR_SPR_DIS
Field.Description: If set then the corresponding Q-Pair shaper is disabled (gets auto credit and no need to insert it to the calendar).

Field.Name: FORCE_OR_IGNORE_FC
Field.Description: If ForceFcMode asserted, asserting this bit force flow controll on the corresponding QP. If ForceFcMode is de-asserted, de-asserting this bit ignore flow controll from the corresponding QP.

Field.Name: MAP_QP_TO_IFC
Field.Description: Egress IFC corresponding QP seats under. Relevant for TDM bypass.

Field.Name: QP_SPR_PKT_MODE
Field.Description: if set corresponding QP shaper is in packet resolution.

Field.Name: CPU_COS
Field.Description: CPU COS.

Field.Name: SRC_PORT
Field.Description: Source port.

Field.Name: CHANNEL
Field.Description: output channel.

AppDB.Name: EGQ_INTERFACE_REG_ATTRIBUTES
AppDB.OneLineDescription: A table containing all 'egress queue' register attributes which have 'interface' as key

Field.Name: INIT_FQP_TXI_BIT
Field.Description: Writing to this register initializes the FQP txi logic corresponded to specified EGQ interface.

Field.Name: CREDIT_INIT_BIT
Field.Description: Writing to this register initializes the FQP credit balance (txi) corresponded to EGQ interface with value according to CreditSize.

AppDB.Name: EGQ_INTERFACE_ATTRIBUTES
AppDB.OneLineDescription: A table containing all 'egress queue' attributes which have 'interface' as key

Field.Name: PM_NUM
Field.Description: Port macro number

Field.Name: PM_INTERNAL_PORT
Field.Description: port number internal to the port macro

Field.Name: NIF_PORT_NUM
Field.Description: Nif port number (debug)

Field.Name: TXQ_MAX_BYTES_TH
Field.Description: Each queue stores PDs and returns flow control to the EPS according to both its fill level in PD and virtual fill level in bytes to read. This register defines the fill level in bytes threshold per queue. If threshold is crossed, then the corresponding queue assert flow control to the EPS. the threshold units in 32Bytes.

Field.Name: TXI_IRDY_TH
Field.Description: Define credit balance threshold below which interface is not eligible If credit balance of an interface is higher than configured threshold then the corresponding interface is eligible to be chosen by the ETS.

Field.Name: INTRLV_NOT_PKT_BOUND
Field.Description: If asserted allow FQP to go to HP context in middle of packet. Can be asserted only for Ilkn and RCY.

Field.Name: TXQ_TDM_IRDY_SEL
Field.Description: If asserted corresponding interface is looking on TxqTdmIreadyTh to define Q irdy.

Field.Name: IFC_AE_SEL
Field.Description: Select AE min gap when interface All Qs under interface are AE but interface is not AE

Field.Name: MIN_GAP_HP
Field.Description: Define minimum gap between consecutive access to same interface if serving HP Q.

Field.Name: MIN_GAP_LP
Field.Description: Define minimum gap between consecutive access to same interface if serving LP Q.

Field.Name: IFC_IS_CHANNELIZED
Field.Description: Dtermines whether its channelized or non-chennlized.

Field.Name: TDM_HP_SHARE_TXQ
Field.Description: If asserted Packet HP and TDM ports of the corresponding interface will share the same TXQ.

Field.Name: IFC_IS_ACTIVE
Field.Description: If asserted correspondig interface participate in egress scheduling.

Field.Name: NON_CH_IFC_BASE_QUEUE_PAIR
Field.Description: Map IFC to OTM port if IfcIsChannelized == 0.

Field.Name: MAP_PS_TO_IFC
Field.Description: Bitmap of 64 bits, represnts the Port Schedulers which belong to the corresponding interface.

AppDB.Name: EGQ_TC_DP_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: A table containing mapping of Port-COS-Map-Profile, Egress-MC, SYS-TC,SYS-DP to Egress-TC, CGM-MC-DP

Field.Name: EGRESS_TC
Field.Description: Egress TC of a packet determines the queue number of the enqueue action. The Egress TC range must be according to the OTM-Port mode as follows: 1. If the OTM-Port is 1P, then Egress-TC must be 0. 2. If the OTM-Port is 2P, then Egress-TC must be in range 0-1 3. If the OTM-Port is 8P, then Egress-TC must be in rang 0-7.

Field.Name: CGM_MC_DP
Field.Description: This parameter defines for which DP the incoming packet is belong. Each DP has different drop thresholds in CGM.

AppDB.Name: EGQ_TM_PORT_ATTRIBUTES
AppDB.OneLineDescription: A table containing all 'egress queue' attributes which have 'tm_port' as key

Field.Name: QPAIR_BASE
Field.Description: Indicate the Qpair base number.

Field.Name: CGM_INTERFACE
Field.Description: Indicate the interface number to be used by CGM (Congestion Management )

AppDB.Name: EGQ_PQP_COUNTER
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configure the programmable counter in PQP block

AppDB.Name: EGQ_RQP_COUNTER
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configure the programmable counter in RQP block

AppDB.Name: EGQ_EPNI_COUNTER
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configure the programmable counter in EPNI block
